title: Betim Berisha (BBI Autosport)
description:
How do you win at Pikes Peak? Ask Betim Berisha,  co-founder of BBI Autosport, a shop that specializes in modifying Porsche street cars and race cars. Recently, his team went to the 2021 Pikes Peak Hill Climb and came back with three trophies, which is no small feat. We get into the details about power, aero, grip, elevation, competing against Bentley, and more. This was a great show and we learned a lot about going fast. 

 

Policygenius has saved customers an average of $1,250 per year over what they were paying for home & auto insurance. Go to Policygenius.com to get started.  

 

Get your Decked Drawer System at Decked.com/SMOKINGTIRE and get free shipping.
